data.title: Prayatna Nepal Organization
data.meta_description: In this page you will find all the news and posts about various activities done by Prayatna Nepal in different times. All the posts are arranged from newest to
data.text:
Distribution of educational materials to the blind students

Prayatna Nepal team went to Odari secondary school Kapilvastu to distribute educational materials to the blind and visually impaired students. Talking calculator, accessible geometry kit, pen drive player braille paper were the materials distributed to the students. The program was hosted by Ms. Abina Panthi , resource teacher of the school in the chair of […]

Continue reading

Orientation and Mobility Training

Orientation and Mobility is a profession-specific to blindness and low vision that teaches safe, efficient, and effective travel skills to blind and visually impaired people. This refers to the ability to know where they are and where they want to go, whether you’re moving from one room to another or walking city or village area […]

Continue reading

Feminist Dialogue Series

Prayatna Nepal conducted one-day Feminist Dialogue Series in Pokhara on 27th December 2023 among 19 blind and visually impaired women and girls. The program was formally started by Miss Sarita Lamichhane chairperson of Prayatna Nepal. She welcomed all the participants. She introduced Prayatna Nepal as organization. She mainly focused on the activities that are conducted […]

Continue reading

National Validation workshop on web accessibility audit report

Prayatna Nepal successfully conducted the national validation workshop on web accessibility audit report on December 15,2022 at hotel Marshyangdi, Thamel. This half-day sharing program was based on the web accessibility Audit of 20 public websites and 10 mobile applications that Prayatna nepal has conducted on the course of 'Promoting Digital Rights-Ensuring Digital Accessibilities of persons […]
